item.description:
Hi,

Since we had a great time earlier this month at The Loft, we are heading back for their Retro Riot Thursday. Guest DJ spinning us back to the 80s. Music starts at 9 p.m.

As I mentioned before, the lounge has a fun and unique decor. It is worth checking out. Hope you can join us!

Carpool if you can.

Parking can be tricky -- it's across the street from the hotel and not well lit.
item.name: 80s Retro Night @ The Loft, NYLO Hotel
